snippet: The audience on Wednesday night for the drama - whose original run ended in 1991 - was 6.9 million viewers on TNT, enough to beat all broadcast network shows.
abstract: The audience on Wednesday night for the drama - whose original run ended in 1991 - was 6.9 million viewers on TNT, enough to beat all broadcast network shows.

headline.main: 'Dallas' Returns After 20 Years to Solid Ratings
